member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory2.CreateMediaKeys2
member.summary: Creates a media keys object based on the specified key system.
member.param: Points to the default file location for the store Content Decryption Module (CDM) data.

Points to a the inprivate location for the store Content Decryption Module (CDM) data. Specifying this path allows the CDM to comply with the application’s privacy policy by putting personal information in the file location indicated by this path.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory2
member.summary: Creates an instance of the object.
